title: Finally Silver!
body: Can't get called a bronze scrub now. HAHAHAHHAHA. Get rekt bronze scrubs,  how many bronze players does it take to screw a lightbulb? none, because they can't climb the ladder.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

But Golds can call you silver scrub. And when you reach Gold the plats can call you Gold scrub.... and so on and so forth. Until you realize you can never be anything more than just a scrub through the eyes of the likes of Aphromoo, Piccaboo and yes the fan boy favorite Faker.

Never the less, enjoy the new ### scrub position, good luck climbing to the next ### scrub position xD

Sloth, ~~unranked~~ (now) Bronze Scrub.
Man Silver is the same as bronze until you hit about s2 it's kinda sad imo, Good luck getting out of silver man...
silver 5 is barely different from bronze lol
